properties.name: workflowSettingsNotice
properties.default: Select a workflow to see its available parameters.

properties.name: profileName
properties.description: Select an optional performance profile to override default settings for speed and quality.

properties.name: prompt
properties.placeholder: A detailed painting of a pirate hat on a wooden table...
properties.description: The text prompt describing the image you want to generate.

properties.name: negative_prompt
properties.description: Describe what you want to avoid in the image.

properties.name: resolution
properties.description: The dimensions of the output image.

properties.name: outputAsFilePath
properties.description: Whether to save the output to a specified file path. Uncheck to output as binary data.

properties.name: outputFilePath
properties.description: The full file path or directory where the generated image will be saved.

properties.name: outputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name to give the output binary property for the generated image.
